In England, in the seven days to 31 March, there were 24,714 new confirmed cases (43.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 24 March, there were 31,881 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 22% (7,167 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 05 April is 3,814,424 (6,776.7 cases per 100,000 population).
